TopicTitle: In Flight View, Targeted (Blue) Craft Icons/Names are Getting Hidden Within Untargeted (White) Craft Icons

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

Issue:
Highest/Top Icon/Name Display Priority Should be the Targeted Craft

Video Evidence:
Showing Blue behind White with Moving the Camera:
https://youtu.be/8sIO4tTi2C0 (11 Seconds)

Save File for Video:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/yx87fj2wtum93on/TargetedUnderUntargetted.zip?dl=0

Additional Information:

  • If it is actually a transparency problem instead then the Targeted icon should be Opaque and on top.
Edited May 23, 2023 by Anth12
